https://tmrev.io/movie/758069-Charlot Watches You 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9HHFUkY3sT7Vn7qotaHeaGgyrKO.jpg Having cult Serbian new wave band Sarlo Akrobata (Charlot the Acrobat) and their members as a central point, this film shows cultural milieu of the 1980s in Yugoslavia, and subsequent downfall of alternative culture in it. Charlot Watches You
